channel.title: Pyboard on Zardam's home
channel.description: Recent content in Pyboard on Zardam's home

item.title: NumWorks controlling a pyboard rover
item.description: Just a small video about controlling a MicroPython pyboard based rover by a NumWorks calculator. This is one of the rover my wife is using to teach Python programming in her high school. They were modified to use a pyboard instead of the original arduino controller using a custom PCB.
